fixed_skill.desc: Grant a shield to party equal to 25.5%/26.8%/28.0% of user's Attack + 771/955/1152. While shielded, increase damage by 20.4%/21.4%/22.4% for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Devoted Guard

innate_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 154.5/162.2/170.0% of Attack.
innate_skill.name: Sword Dance

innate_skill.desc: At the start of battle, increase party's Defense by 11.8% for 2 turns or until user changes Personas.
innate_skill.name: Auto-Maraku III

passive_skill.desc: Increase Defense by 43.6%. When Sandalphon is present, increase shielded allies' Defense by 28%, and when not present, increase shielded allies' Defense by 15%.
passive_skill.name: Titan's Protection

passive_skill.desc: Increase Defense by 43.6%. When Sandalphon is present, increase shielded allies' Defense by 28%, and when not present, increase shielded allies' Defense by 15%. When using a unique skill, decrease HP cost by 15%.
passive_skill.name: Titan's Protection I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Defense by 43.6%. When Sandalphon is present, increase shielded allies' Defense by 42%, and when not present, increase shielded allies' Defense by 15%. When using a unique skill, decrease HP cost by 15%.
passive_skill.name: Titan's Protection II

passive_skill.desc: Increase Defense by 43.6%. When Sandalphon is present, increase shielded allies' Defense by 42%, and when not present, increase shielded allies' Defense by 25%. When using a unique skill, decrease HP cost to 15%.
passive_skill.name: Titan's Protection III

showtime_skill.desc: Grant a shield to party equal to 48.6%/52.0%/55.4% Attack + 1471/1854/2275 for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
